title: Project border
body: can someone please tell me if the project boarder on the loading screen applies to when you only use a project champion or just any champion, thanks

replies.body: why would it apply to anything but the project skins?
because i would rather have the border with everyone other than just 1 champion

> [{quoted}](name=SheepPowder,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ox7qbyEM,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-09-09T04:32:26.064+0000)
>
> because i would rather have the border with everyone other than just 1 champion

yeah but that's not logical.
it's the project border
why would it be on any skin but the project skins.
